code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import Header from'../../components/Header';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardInstructorProfile=()=>{const[form,setForm]=useState({Instructor_id:'',Instructor_name:'',email:'',phone_number:'',department:'',faculty:'',position:'',profile_image:''});const[selectedFile,setSelectedFile]=useState(null);const
